summary: 该插件用于检测Jetty服务器是否存在CVE-2021-28164漏洞，通过发送特定请求检查是否能够获取到WEB-INF/web.xml文件内容，从而判断是否存在信息泄露问题。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect whether the Jetty server has the CVE-2021-28164 vulnerability. It sends a specific request to check if the content of the WEB-INF/web.xml file can be obtained, thereby determining whether there is an information disclosure issue.
